timeline.bodyText:
We should change import to require a space after it.
Why do coms need to end with .* but the others don't?
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@
     <module name="RegexpSingleline">
       <!-- catch lines above 100 symbols -->
       <property name="format"
-                value="^(?!(.*href|.*http|import|.* com.*|.*com/.*|.* files=)).{101,}$"/>
+                value="^(?!(.*href|.*http|import|.* com\..*|.*com\..*|.* files=|.*\.dtd)).{101,}$"/>

replies.bodyText: I upated regexp to make it more strict.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: What is the original purpose of adding the com ones? From what I saw, it was for the XML files and their lines with multiple packages. Does it make sense we change the .* before them to something that will more specifically target the XML files instead of hitting our inputs by accident?
